Surgeries &Procedures performed Independently: 
1. Nonoperative management of all types of fractures and cold cases(TB,CTEV etc) 
2. Debridement and lavage of wounds in open fractures 
3. Closed and open reduction of fractures and dislocations 
4. Skilled management of all types of trauma 
5. K wire fixation of distal radial and pediatric long bone fractures 
6. Plation/Nailing of forearm fractures 
7. ORIF/CRIF of phalangeal and metacarpal fractures using K wires . 
8. Fixation/ Tension band wiring for Olecranon, Patella, medial and lateral Malleoli 
9. Foot fracture fixation including Lisfranc injuries 
10. Fasciotomy, Split Skin Grafting 
11. Amputations (Digits, transmetatarsal, below knee, above knee, below elbow,
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
above elbow) 
12. Pelvic fracture Ex Fix 
13. Intramedullary nailing for femur& tibia . 
14. Open reduction and internal fixation of forearm, humerus and both bones leg,
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
femur and ankle joint fractures 
15. Communited intra-articular fractures 
16. Worked independently in a tertiary care (Level 1) Trauma Centre :External
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
fixation of distal radial fractures, tibial fractures and intra-articular fractures of
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
upper humerus, lower end humerus, upper tibial plateau distal tibia and Dynamic
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
hip screw/condylar screw fixation, proximal femoral, reconstructive nailing for
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
trochanteric, subtrochanteric and condylar fractures of the Femur, 
17. Illizarovs fixation and tibial corticotomy, tibial Lengthening 
18. Tendon repairs in hand and Achilles tendon repair 
19. Tendon lengthening and tendon release 
20. Surgery for trigger finger- open as well as percutaneous needle release. 
21. Pedicle screw fixation-under supervision 
22. Percutaneous as well as open release of A1 Pulley for trigger finger
